Class: ConferenceClientConfiguration

.Conference. ConferenceClientConfiguration

Configuration for ConferenceClient.

new ConferenceClientConfiguration()

Members

<nullable> rtcConfiguration :RTCConfiguration

It will be used for creating PeerConnection.

Type:
  • RTCConfiguration
See:
  • RTCConfiguration Dictionary of WebRTC 1.0.
Example
// Following object can be set to conferenceClientConfiguration.rtcConfiguration.
{
  iceServers: [{
     urls: "stun:example.com:3478"
  }, {
    urls: [
      "turn:example.com:3478?transport=udp",
      "turn:example.com:3478?transport=tcp"
    ],
     credential: "password",
     username: "username"
  }
}
